feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-07-23T19:54:37.095429Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;Llama2.c：在一个纯 C 文件中推理 llama 2</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/karpathy/llama2.c</id>; <更新>;2023-07-23 T18:54:03.532962Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/karpathy/llama2.c"/>; <作者>; <name>;anjneymidha</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=anjneymidha</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/karpathy/llama2.c/master/ass ets/llama_cute.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;使用此代码，您可以在 PyTorch 中从头开始训练 Llama 2 LLM 架构，将权重保存到原始二进制文件中，并将其加载到 C 文件中进行推理。 C 文件可以通过简单的方法以交互速率运行合理大小的模型。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#llama2-c-inference-llama-2-in-one-file-of-pure-c" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36838051" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;为什么在科索沃托管数据中心？</stitle>; <id>;https://basehost.eu/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T17:54:03.534283Z</updated>; <link href="https://basehost.eu/"/>; <author>; <name>;asadm</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user？ id=asadm</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;位于科索沃的数据中心是托管内容审查和抵抗政府影响的绝佳选择，无论在运营商所在地是否合法。这是因为科索沃没有得到许多国家的承认，这可以为可能试图审查或攻击此类内容的国家行为者提供额外的保护，因为根本没有办法执行法律，甚至无法联系科索沃政府而不因缺乏外交承认而引起法律问题，因为联系科索沃当局将意味着该国存在并得到承认。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#why-host-datacenter-in-kosovo" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36837690" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;JavaScript 中的 SICP</stitle>; <id>;https://sourceacademy.org/sicpjs/index</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T16:54:03.535149Z</updated>; <link href="https://sourceacademy.org/sicpjs/index"/>; <author>; <name>;behnamoh</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id= behnamoh</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;用于学习编程的沉浸式体验环境，由新加坡国立大学计算机学院开发。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#sicp-in-javascript" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36836729" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;男子因运行 Tor 出口节点而被判犯有儿童色情罪</stitle>; <id>;https://lowendbox.com/blog/man-found-guilty-of-child-porn-because-he-ran-a-tor-exit-node-the-story-of-william-weber/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T17:54:03.536114Z</updated>; <link href="https://lowendbox.com/ blog/man-found-guilty-of-child-porn-because-he-ran-a-tor-exit-node-the-story-of-william-weber/"/>; <author>; <name>;h0ek</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=h0ek</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://lowendbox.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/ 07/william-tor.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;LowEndTalk 的长期成员 William Weber 因与在 TOR 网络上运营的儿童色情团伙有关而遭到奥地利政府的搜查。大量电脑、枪支和其他物品被没收，韦伯可能被指控传播和可能制作儿童色情制品。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#man-found-guilty-of-child-porn-because-he-ran-a-tor-exit-node" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36837273" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;针对 Ruby 开发者的 Elixir：三个最重要的区别</stitle>; <id>;https://phoenixonrails.com/blog/elixir-for-ruby-developers-the- Three-most-important-differences</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T15:54:03.537030Z</updated>; <link href=" https://phoenixonrails.com/blog/elixir-for-ruby-developers-the- Three-most-important-differences"/>; <author>; <name>;arrowsmith</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=arrowsmith</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://phoenixonrails.com/images/blog/red-potion.jpg" style="width: 2 20 像素；高度：147 像素；" />;<br />;Elixir 是一种函数式语言，在语法和代码结构上与 Ruby 不同。它不像 Ruby 那样有类和对象，而是使用模块和函数。 Elixir 也是不可变的，这意味着对象一旦创建就无法更改。此外，Elixir 是一种在 BEAM 虚拟机上运行的编译语言。它很大程度上基于 Erlang，也可以作为解释语言运行。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#elixir-for-ruby-developers-the- Three-most-important-differences" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36836258" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hacker news.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：我制作了一个连接到您的数据库的 MailChimp 替代方案</stitle>; <id>;https://cc.dev</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T16:54:03.537921Z</updated>; <link href="https://cc.dev"/>; <author>; <name>;kashnote</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user ?id=kashnote</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.cc.dev/static/images/db/postgres_db_type_logo.svg" style="width: 220px; height: 221px;" />;<br />;使用 SQL 连接数据库并直接定位受众。使用我们简单的工具和模板，以平常成本的一小部分发送高质量的营销电子邮件。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-i-made-a-mailchimp-alternative-that-c​​onnects-to-your-database" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36836596" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;范畴论的不变量解决了数学生态学中的问题 [pdf]</stitle>; <id>;https://www.maths.ed.ac.uk/~tl/genova/genova_talk.pdf</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T15:54:03.538807Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.maths. ed.ac.uk/~tl/genova/genova_talk.pdf"/>; <author>; <name>;peanutcrisis</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=peanutcrisis</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;有限度量空间 A 的相似度矩阵为 n × n 矩阵 Z。随着距离从 0 增加到 Infini，A 的基数从 1 增加到 2。q 阶的最大多样性为Z 的大小，最大化多样性的分布是 Z 的权重，归一化为 1。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#an-invariant-from-category-theory-solves-a-problem-in-mathematical-ecology-pdf" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=3683635 8" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;观众替补 Keith Moon (2016) 的夜晚</stitle>; <id>;https://www.loudersound.com/features/what-happened-the-night-an-audience-member-filled-in-for-keith-moon</id >; <更新>;2023-07-23T14:54:03.540608Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.loudersound.com/features/what-happened-the-night-an-audience-member-filled-in-for-keith-moon"/>; <作者>; <name>;thunderbong</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=thunderbong</uri >; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/TmVWRsZw2tkEH8vbrKnmkJ-320-80.jpg" style="width: 220px;身高：124px;" />;<br />;1973 年 11 月 20 日，Keith Moon 因药物而丧失行为能力后，19 岁的 Scott Halpin 与 The Who 一起打鼓。Halpin 的表演给乐队和观众留下了深刻的印象。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-night-an-audience-member-filled-in-for-keith-moon-2016" target="_blank">; [摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36835735" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;研究揭示了运动神经元疾病的基础疾病规模</stitle>; <id>;https://medicalxpress.com/news/ 2023-07-reveals-scale-disorder-underpinning-motor.html</id>; <更新>;2023-07-23T16:54:03.541506Z</更新>; <link href="https://medicalxpress.com/news/2023-07-reveals-scale-disorder-underpinning-motor.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;wglb</名称>; <uri>;https://news .ycombinator.com/user?id=wglb</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://scx1.b-cdn.net/csz/news/800a/2014/motorneurone.png" style="width: 220px; height: 162px;" />;<br />;研究人员发现，受运动神经元疾病 (MND)（也称为肌萎缩侧索硬化症 (ALS)）影响的神经细胞中，数百种蛋白质和 mRNA 分子错位。这种错位也延伸到 mRNA，表明细胞内存在潜在的运输问题。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#research-reveals-the-scale-of-disorder-underpinning-motor-neuron -disease" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我们为什么不通过从海水中取出盐来获取饮用水？(2008)</stitle>; <id>;https://www.scientificamerican.com/article/why-dont-we-get-our-drinking-water-from-the -ocean/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-23T16:54:03.542393Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.scientificamerican.com/article/why-dont-we-get-our-drinking-water-from-the-ocean/"/>; <作者>; <name>;LinuxBender</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=LinuxBender</ uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static.scientificamerican.com/sciam/cache/file/457A3B34-0166-432A-BC363063E40ED74A_source.jpg?w=590&h=800&C9F62A61-85F0-476D-8070500A94D3A0 F7"样式="宽度：220px； height: 299px;" />;<br />;由于成本和能源需求较高，海水淡化并不是一种广泛使用的获取饮用水的方法。海水淡化过程需要打破盐和水之间的牢固化学键，这需要大量的能源。此外，海水淡化还存在环境问题，例如对海洋生物的影响和浓盐水的处理。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#why-don-t-we-get-our -drinking-water-by-take-salt-out-seawater-2008" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36836639" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;F ossil显示哺乳动物将牙齿插入恐龙</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theguardian.com/science/2023/jul/18/mesozoic-fossil-dinosaur-mammal-fight</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T15:54:03.543252Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.theguardian.com/science/2023/jul/18/ mesozoic-fossil-dinosaur-mammal-fight"/>; <author>; <name>;Hooke</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Hooke</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i.guim.co.uk/img/media/5eb35cb456f7ba63ad0fabbbc52c148dbe6a1b42/ 0_0_4000_3150/master/4000.jpg?width=445&dpr=1&s=none" style="宽度：220px;高度：174px;" />;<br />;一块新发现的化石表明，有时小型哺乳动物能够反击恐龙。这块拥有 1.25 亿年历史的化石显示，一种小型哺乳动物的牙齿陷入了喙状恐龙的肋骨中。这一发现挑战了早期哺乳动物只是恐龙猎物的观点。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#fossil-shows-mammal-sinking-teeth-into -dinosaur" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36832293" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;混合 Swift 和 C++</stitle>; <id>;https://www.swift.org /documentation/cxx-interop/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T14:54:03.545015Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.swift.org/documentation/cxx-interop/"/>; <author>; <name>;oumua_don17</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=oumua_don17</uri>; </author>; <内容类型="html">;<img src="https://www.swift.org/apple-touch-icon-180x180.png" style="width: 220px; height: 221px;" />;<br />;本文档是描述如何混合 Swift 和 C++ 的参考指南。它提供了示例，展示了如何在 Swift 中使用 C++ API 以及如何在 C++ 中使用 Swift API。C++ 互操作性是即将发布的 Swift 5.9 版本中的一项新功能。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#mixing-swift-and-c" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36835412" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Show HN：我为极简主义者和我自己制作了一个可定制的 iOS 浏览器</stitle>; <id>;https://apps.apple.com/us/app/quiche-browser/id 1668363952</id>; <更新>;2023-07-23T12:54:03.545906Z</更新>; <link href="https://apps.apple.com/us/app/quiche-browser/id1668363952"/>; <作者>; <name>;nckh</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=nckh</uri>; </author >; <content type="html">;<img src="https://is1-ssl.mzstatic.com/image/thumb/Purple126/v4/aa/5b/6c/aa5b6cdf-5397-6c14-76d4-d23d46f7e34c/AppIcon-1x_U007ephone-0-0-0-0-0-85-220.png/ 1200x630wa.png" style="宽度: 220px; height: 116px;" />;<br />;最可定制的浏览器，允许用户个性化工具栏、弹出菜单、地址栏等。它还提供增强的选项卡管理并优先考虑用户隐私。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-i-made-a-customized-ios-browser-for-minimalists-and-myself" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.y Combinator.com/item?id=36834732" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;不以 .gov 结尾的政府 URL</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/GSA/govt-urls</id>; <更新>;2023-07- 23T16:54:03.547631Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/GSA/govt-urls"/>; <作者>; <name>;notmysql_</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=notmysql_</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/54ed074dedf72f8393 de6ec4e562dc158cabc4409e86da5d3b41729e216ba7b2/GSA/govt-urls" style="宽度：220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;此存储库包含不属于 .gov 和 .mil 域的公共政府管理域的列表。欢迎更新和添加。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#government-urls-that-don-t-end-in-gov" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=3 6836649" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;女王吉他手和天体物理学家 Brian May 发布小行星 3D 图集</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theguardian.com/science/2023/jul/23/queen-brian-may-3d-at las-bennu-asteroid</id>; <更新>;2023-07-23T17:54:03.548505Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.theguardian.com/science/2023/jul/23/queen-brian-may-3d-atlas-bennu-asteroid"/>; <作者>; <name>;pseudolus</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user? id=pseudolus</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i.guim.co.uk/img/media/64b306bb8fbd5ccdd85612664b89a2143429d59e/0_0_1190_1125/master/1190.jpg?width=445&dpr=1&s=none" style="width: 220 像素；高度：209px;" />;<br />;亚利桑那大学行星科学专家但丁·劳雷塔 (Dante Lauretta) 和皇后乐队首席吉他手布莱恩·梅 (Brian May) 合作创作了第一本完整的三维小行星图集，名为 Bennu。这本书名为《Bennu 3-D：小行星解剖》，其中包含来自 Osiris-Rex 任务的图像和数据，并将提供对生命起源的见解。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#queen-吉他手和天体物理学家-brian-may-to-release-3d-atlas-of-asteroid" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36837695" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;多亏了这个博客，我找到了一份 IT 工作</stitle>; <id>;https://giuliomagnifico.blog/misc/2023/07/22/I-found-a-IT-job-thanks-to-this-blog.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T06:54:03.549390Z</updated>; <link href="https://giuliomagnifico.blog/misc /2023/07/22/I-found-a-IT-job-thanks-to-this-blog.html"/>; <author>; <name>;giuliomagnifico</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=giuliomagnifico</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://giuliomagnifico.blog/_images/2023/IT-jobs-blog /IMG_9768.jpg" style="宽度: 220px; height: 165px;" />;<br />;一家安全公司在阅读了作者的博文后向作者提供了一份工作。作者接受了这份工作，现在担任 DevOps 或系统管理员，使用 Grafana 和 Prometheus 构建数据中心并创建监控系统。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#i-found-an-it-job-thanks-to-this-blog" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36833089" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;呼叫中心工作人员与人工智能的战斗</stitle>; <id>;https://www.nytimes.com/2023/07/19/business/call-center-workers -battle-with-ai.html</id>; <更新>;2023-07-23T14:54:03.550265Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.nytimes.com/2023/07/19/business/call-center-workers-battle-with-ai.html"/>; <author>; <name>;elsewhen</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=el sewhen</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static01.nyt.com/images/2023/07/19/multimedia/19AI-Customer-Service-Jobs-wjvm/19AI-Customer-Service-Jobs-wjvm-articleLarge.jpg?quality=75&auto=webp&disable=upscale" style="width: 220px; height: 275px;" />;<br />;人工智能 (AI) 在客户服务岗位上的崛起引起了员工的担忧，其中包括 AT&T 呼叫中心工作人员 Ylonda Sherrod。她担心自己会被人工智能技术取代，以及对自己的工作和生计的潜在影响。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-call-center-workers-battle-with-ai" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36835571" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;接口一直向下</stitle>; <id>;https://jjain.substack.com/p/interfaces-all-the-way-down</id>; <updated>;20 23-07-23T15：54：03.551160Z </更新>; <link href="https://jjain.substack.com/p/interfaces-all-the-way-down"/>; <作者>; <name>;jinay</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jinay</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch /w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:好,fl_progressive:陡峭/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F50cdb57b-fb08-4aaf-a11e-cf3ff92da9df_912x548.png" style="宽度: 220px; height: 133px;" />;<br />;软件工程成功的关键是要非常熟练地设计界面。随着工程师在职业生涯中不断进步，他们需要负责更大、更复杂的界面。高质量的界面会带来欣赏、信任和完成更大任务的机会。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#interfaces-all-the-way-down" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator .com/item?id=36836433" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;想要减少车祸吗？移除交通信号和路标 (2017)</stitle>; <id>;https://bigthink.com/the-present/want-less-car-accidents-get-rid-of-tra ffic-signals-road-signs/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T17:54:03.552349Z</updated>; <link href="https://bigthink.com/the-present/want-less-car-accidents-get-rid-of-traffic-signals-road-signs/"/>; <author>; <name>;mpweiher</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user ?id=mpweiher</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://bigthink.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/origin-1.jpg?w=480&h=270&crop=1" style="width: 220px;高度：124px;" />;<br />;荷兰交通工程师汉斯·蒙德曼 (Hans Monderman) 认为，拆除路缘石、交通信号和标志可以让驾驶员更加警觉和谨慎。他的理念“共享空间”已在世界各地的城市中得到实施，并改善了交通流量并减少了事故。他的理念的关键是理解社区内道路隐含环境所产生的行为。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#want-fewer- car-accidents-remove-traffic-signals-and-road-signs-2017" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36837448" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;魔法王国的落魄（2003）</stitle>; <id>;https://www.gutenberg.org/files/8086/8086-h/8086-h.htm</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T10:54:03.553514Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.gutenberg.org/files/8086/8086- h/8086-h.htm"/>; <author>; <name>;keepamovin</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=keepamovin</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;《魔法王国的穷困潦倒》是一个引人入胜的科幻故事，背景设定在华特·迪士尼统治世界、死亡已被治愈的未来。主角努力保护魔法王国最初的人类面貌，对抗地球的后人类继承者。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#down-and-out-in-the-magic-kingdom-2003" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36833951" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;染发剂和化学直发剂的使用与乳腺癌风险（2019）</stitle>; <id>;https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/full/10.1002/ijc.32738</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T16:54:03.554589Z</updated>; <link href="https://onlinelibrary. wiley.com/doi/full/10.1002/ijc.32738"/>; <author>; <name>;ImpressiveWebs</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ImpressiveWebs</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#hair-dye-and-chemical-straightener-use-and-breast-cancer-risk-2 019" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36836866" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Google Nest Mini 已被彻底清理并重建以运行自定义代理</stitle>; <id>;https ://hackaday.com/2023/07/23/google-nest-mini-gutted-and-rebuilt-to-run-custom-agents/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-23T17:54:03.555569Z</更新>; <link href="https://hackaday.com/2023/07/23/google-nest-mini-gutted-and-rebuilt-to-run -custom-agents/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;jklinger410</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jklinger410</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://hackaday.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/gnest_feat.jpg?w=800" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;Google Nest Mini 是一款流行的智能扬声器，可进行定制以运行自定义语音助手。Justin Alvey 通过用自己的内部组件替换原始 PCB 来修改 Nest Mini，使其能够使用 Matrix 框架与名为“Maubot”的自定义语音助手配合使用。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#google-nest-mini-gutted-and-rebuilt-to-run-custom-agents" target="_ Blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36837391" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;LeCun：高通与 Meta 合作在移动设备上运行 Llama-2</stitle>; <id>;https ://twitter.com/ylecun/status/1683138295155372032</id>; <更新>;2023-07-23T16:54:03.556566Z</更新>; <link href="https://twitter.com/ylecun/status/1683138295155372032"/>; <作者>; <名称>;birriel </名称>; <uri>;https ://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=birriel</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;出了点问题，但不用担心 - 让我们再试一次。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#lecun-qualcomm-working-with-meta-to-run-llama-2-on-mobile-devices" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36836538" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;茎公式</stitle>; <id>;https://stemformulas.com/formulas/</id>; <content type="html">;文章包含与向量微积分和矩阵乘法相关的数学方程。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#stem-formulas" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36817851" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;什么每个 IT 人员都需要了解 OpenBSD (2021)</stitle>; <id>;https://nxdomain.no/~peter/what_every_it_person_needs_to_know_about_openbsd.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T07:54:03.558128Z</updated>; <link href="https://nxdomain.no/~peter/what_every_it_person_ need_to_know_about_openbsd.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;todsacerdoti </name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=todsacerdoti</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://nxdomain.no/~peter/blogpix/tshirt-4.gif" style="width: 220px; height: 192px;" />;<br />;OpenBSD 是一个免费且安全的操作系统，专注于正确且安全的代码。它率先使用了强加密技术，并以其代码审计实践而闻名。 OpenBSD 广泛应用于以网络为中心的角色，并且是多种广泛使用的软件组件的来源。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#what-every-it-person-needs-to-know-about-openbsd-2021" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36833393" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;电解电容器：概述、拆解和实验[视频]</stitle>; <id>;https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MAP-VA1m-A4</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T12:54:03.558910Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MAP- VA1m-A4"/>; <作者>; <name>;daneel_w</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=daneel_w</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<iframe src="//www.youtube.com/embed/MAP-VA1m-A4"frameborder="0"allowfullscreen loading="lazy">;</iframe>; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#electric lytic-capacitors-overview-teardown-and-experiments-video" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36820835" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;丰田一直在开发续航里程为 745 英里的电动汽车固态电池</stitle>; <id>;https://www.topspeed.com/toyota-745-mile-solid-state-battery/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T09:54:03.559679Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.topspeed.com/toyota-745-mile-solid-state-battery/ "/>; <author>; <name>;achow</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=achow</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static1.topspeedimages.com/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/toyota-bz4x-2023-1600-1e-fotor-202307201758 37.jpg"样式="宽度:220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;丰田开发了一种用于电动汽车的固态电池，续航里程为 745 英里，充电时间为 10 分钟，为整个行业带来了革命性的变化。这一突破表明丰田对后 ICE 未来的态度发生了转变。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#toyota-has-been-developing-a-solid-state-battery-for-evs-with-a-range-of- 745mi" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36833836" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
